SELECT t1.ID_, t2.ID_ courseId, t1.COURSE_CODE_, t1.COURSE_NAME_, t1.COURSE_NAME_EN_, t1.TRAINING_LEVEL_, t1.CREDITS_, t1.FACULTY_ FROM course_open_t t1 JOIN course_t t2 ON ( t1.IS_OPEN_ = 1 AND t1.COURSE_CODE_ = t2.CODE_ ) WHERE COURSE_CODE_ NOT IN ( SELECT t2.CODE_ FROM course_t t2 JOIN elc_affinity_courses_t t3 ON t2.ID_ = t3.COURSE_ID_ )
and t1.COURSE_CODE_ like concat('%',#{courseCode},'%')
and t1.COURSE_NAME_ like concat('%',#{courseName},'%')
